The Austria Billie Jean King Cup team represents Austria in the Billie Jean King Cup tennis competition and is governed by the Austrian Tennis Federation, known in German as . They currently compete in the Europe/Africa Group I.
History
Austria competed in its first Federation Cup in 1963. They have reached the semifinals of the competition on three occasions, in 1987, 1990 and 2002.
Current team (2025)
*Julia Grabher
*Tamara Kostic
*Arabella Koller
*Ekaterina Perelygina
*Mavie Osterreicher
